globalShortTerm._comment: Global short-term filtered to [global/*] tags - tokenLimit: workingDays × 750

projectShortTerm._comment: Project short-term filtered to [project/*] tags - tokenLimit: workingDays × 750

projectSettings._comment: If true, /project/subdir matches /project for project memory loading

synthesis._comment: Minimum hours between auto-synthesis prompts (always runs on first session of day). Model: sonnet|opus|haiku. Background: true runs synthesis without blocking user.

decay._comment: Learnings older than ageDays are archived; archived items older than archiveRetentionDays are purged

_tokenGuidance.estimation: 1 token ≈ 4 characters. File bytes / 4 = rough token count
_tokenGuidance.formula: Short-term limits = workingDays × 750 (based on ~400-600 observed after scope filtering)
